CustomField.description: Based on formula defined in Corporate Standard CS1.3. If two CIA scores are 4, then Criticality is 5, otherwise it is the MAX of the CIA scores.
CustomField.formula: IF( Availability_Score__c + Confidentiality_Score__c + Integrity_Score__c - MIN(Availability_Score__c, Confidentiality_Score__c, Integrity_Score__c) = 8, 5, MAX(Availability_Score__c, Confidentiality_Score__c, Integrity_Score__c) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Highest of the Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability assessments.
CustomField.label: Asset Criticality Score
